subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Zach Randolph's short jumper with 21.6 seconds left  helped the Portland Trail Blazers defeat the host Detroit Pistons, 88-85, and stop a five-game losing streak.
snippet: Zach Randolph's short jumper with 21.6 seconds left  helped the Portland Trail Blazers defeat the host Detroit Pistons, 88-85, and stop a five-game losing streak.
